front.title: APIs To Expose SCONE-PRO Metadata to Applications

abstract.t: This document describes API considerations to provide applications with SCONE-PRO metadata, notifying them of network-supplied information about acceptable network flow rates. Since this information is signalled from the network within the stack below the application, it needs to be made accessible to applications in order for them to pick proper video rates, or to otherwise confine the application behavior within network-defined limits.
